title: Secured app suite, using client side encryption
description: Protekt comes with a set of tools whose data is secured using cryptography and no one other than you can ever view the data. Designed with security as a primary factor from ground up. Your passwords never leave your workstation. Our servers have zero knowledge about your password. Number of apps supported under this will increase over time.

title: Bookmark and notes app
description: Bookmarking and note taking website with no ads and no third party tracking. Capture notes with the power of markdown / html formatting. Modern UI with support for light and dark modes. Powerful search capabilities with custom search engine configuration. Tagging support across bookmarks and notes.

title: AI powered customer support tool
description: Use the power of machine learning to do automated search of an user issue and recommend solutions. If the user is not answered, issue will go through a full fledged support system workflow. Customer support person answers the question and this goes into the knowledge base for further training. Easy path to migrate from traditional support systems.
